New Records: LeBron James is the oldest player in NBA history to record back-to-back triple-doubles.
Others: The Lakers won by a score of 123-103 to improve to 6-4 in their first ten games. They are also in the middle of a two-game winning streak. LeBron James finished his night with 19 points, ten rebounds, 16 assists and one steal while shooting 6/14 from the field in 35 minutes of playing time. The Lakers had a tough road trip where they went 1-4 in five games. However, the team is now a perfect 5-0 on their home floor in Los Angeles. As for the Raptors, they dropped to 2-9 in their first 11 games. They are in the middle of a four-game losing streak. Following Los Angeles, the Raptors will visit the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday.
